verses.verse: Now the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto Yonah <WH3124> the son <WH1121> of Amittai <WH573>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go <WH3212> <WH8798> to Ninveh <WH5210>, that great <WH1419> city <WH5892>, and cry <WH7121> <WH8798> against it; for their wickedness <WH7451> is come up <WH5927> <WH8804> before <WH6440> me.

But Yonah <WH3124> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to flee <WH1272> <WH8800> unto Tarshish <WH8659> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, and went down <WH3381> <WH8799> to Yafo <WH3305>; and he found <WH4672> <WH8799> a ship <WH591> going <WH935> <WH8802> to Tarshish <WH8659>: so he paid <WH5414> <WH8799> the fare <WH7939> thereof, and went down <WH3381> <WH8799> into it, to go <WH935> <WH8800> with them unto Tarshish <WH8659> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>.

But the YY <WH3068> sent out <WH2904> <WH8689> a great <WH1419> wind <WH7307> into the sea <WH3220>, and there was a mighty <WH1419> tempest <WH5591> in the sea <WH3220>, so that the ship <WH591> was like <WH2803> <WH8765> to be broken <WH7665> <WH8736>.

Then the mariners <WH4419> were afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, and cried <WH2199> <WH8799> every man <WH376> unto his god <WH430>, and cast forth <WH2904> <WH8686> the wares <WH3627> that were in the ship <WH591> into the sea <WH3220>, to lighten <WH7043> <WH8687> it of them. But Yonah <WH3124> was gone down <WH3381> <WH8804> into the sides <WH3411> of the ship <WH5600>; and he lay <WH7901> <WH8799>, and was fast asleep <WH7290> <WH8735>.

So the shipmaster <WH7227> <WH2259> came <WH7126> <WH8799> to him, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What meanest thou, O sleeper <WH7290> <WH8737>? arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, call <WH7121> <WH8798> upon thy 'Elohim <WH430>, if so be that 'Elohim <WH430> will think <WH6245> <WH8691> upon us, that we perish <WH6> <WH8799> not.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> every one <WH376> to his fellow <WH7453>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us cast <WH5307> <WH8686> lots <WH1486>, that we may know <WH3045> <WH8799> for whose cause <WH7945> this evil <WH7451> is upon us. So they cast <WH5307> <WH8686> lots <WH1486>, and the lot <WH1486> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon Yonah <WH3124>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> they unto him, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> us, we pray thee, for whose cause this evil <WH7451> is upon us; What is thine occupation <WH4399>? and whence <WH370> comest <WH935> <WH8799> thou? what is thy country <WH776>? and of what people <WH5971> art thou?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I am an Hebrew <WH5680>; and I fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of heaven <WH8064>, which hath made <WH6213> <WH8804> the sea <WH3220> and the dry <WH3004> land.

Then were the men <WH582> exceedingly <WH1419> <WH3374> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Why hast thou done <WH6213> <WH8804> this? For the men <WH582> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> that he fled <WH1272> <WH8802> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, because he had told <WH5046> <WH8689> them.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> they unto him, What shall we do <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee, that the sea <WH3220> may be calm <WH8367> <WH8799> unto us? for the sea <WH3220> wrought <WH1980> <WH8802>, and was tempestuous <WH5590> <WH8802>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Take me up <WH5375> <WH8798>, and cast me forth <WH2904> <WH8685> into the sea <WH3220>; so shall the sea <WH3220> be calm <WH8367> <WH8799> unto you: for I know <WH3045> <WH8802> that for my sake <WH7945> this great <WH1419> tempest <WH5591> is upon you.

Nevertheless the men <WH582> rowed hard <WH2864> <WH8799> to bring <WH7725> <WH8687> it to the land <WH3004>; but they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not: for the sea <WH3220> wrought <WH1980> <WH8802>, and was tempestuous <WH5590> <WH8802> against them.

Wherefore they cried <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We beseech thee <WH577>, O YY <WH3068>, we beseech thee, let us not perish <WH6> <WH8799> for this man's <WH376> life <WH5315>, and lay <WH5414> <WH8799> not upon us innocent <WH5355> <WH8675> <WH5355> blood <WH1818>: for thou, O YY <WH3068>, hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> as it pleased <WH2654> <WH8804> thee.
So they took up <WH5375> <WH8799> Yonah <WH3124>, and cast him forth <WH2904> <WH8686> into the sea <WH3220>: and the sea <WH3220> ceased <WH5975> <WH8799> from her raging <WH2197>.

Then the men <WH582> feared <WH3372> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> exceedingly <WH1419> <WH3374>, and offered <WH2076> <WH8799> a sacrifice <WH2077> unto the YY <WH3068>, and made <WH5087> <WH8799> vows <WH5088>.

Now the YY <WH3068> had prepared <WH4487> <WH8762> a great <WH1419> fish <WH1709> to swallow up <WH1104> <WH8800> Yonah <WH3124>. And Yonah <WH3124> was in the belly <WH4578> of the fish <WH1709> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> and three <WH7969> nights <WH3915>.
